name: not
trans: Not means the opposite or the absence of a particular thing or action.

name: also
trans: Also means in addition to something or too.

name: very
trans: Very means to a great extent or degree.

name: often
trans: Often means many times or frequently.

name: however
trans: However means on the other hand or nevertheless.

name: too
trans: Too means also or in addition, and can also indicate an excess or degree of something.

name: usually
trans: Usually means normally or typically.

name: really
trans: Really means truly or genuinely.

name: early
trans: Early means before the usual or expected time.

name: never
trans: Never means not at any time or not once.

name: always
trans: Always means at all times or on every occasion.

name: sometimes
trans: Sometimes means occasionally or from time to time.

name: together
trans: Together means in a group or in a cooperative manner.

name: likely
trans: Likely means probably or with a high probability.

name: simply
trans: Simply means in a plain or straightforward manner.

name: generally
trans: Generally means usually or commonly.

name: instead
trans: Instead means as an alternative or substitute.

name: actually
trans: Actually means in reality or in fact.

name: again
trans: Again means once more or another time.

name: rather
trans: Rather means to a certain extent or degree.

name: almost
trans: Almost means nearly or just about.

name: especially
trans: Especially means particularly or notably.

name: ever
trans: Ever means at any time or in the course of one's life.

name: quickly
trans: Quickly means in a rapid or speedy manner.

name: probably
trans: Probably means likely or with a high probability.

name: already
trans: Already means by this time or before the present time.

name: below
trans: Below means lower or beneath.

name: directly
trans: Directly means immediately or straight.

name: therefore
trans: Therefore means as a result or consequently.

name: else
trans: Else means otherwise or in addition to.

name: thus
trans: Thus means in this way or as a result of this.

name: easily
trans: Easily means with ease or without difficulty.

name: eventually
trans: Eventually means in the end or finally.

name: exactly
trans: Exactly means precisely or accurately.

name: certainly
trans: Certainly means without doubt or surely.

name: normally
trans: Normally means typically or usually.

name: currently
trans: Currently means at the present time or now.

name: extremely
trans: Extremely means to a great extent or degree.

name: finally
trans: Finally means at last or in the end.

name: constantly
trans: Constantly means continuously or always.

name: properly
trans: Properly means correctly or in the appropriate manner.

name: soon
trans: Soon means in a short time or shortly.

name: specifically
trans: Specifically means in a precise or detailed manner.

name: ahead
trans: Ahead means in front or before.

name: daily
trans: Daily means occurring every day or on a daily basis.

name: highly
trans: Highly means to a great degree or extent.

name: immediately
trans: Immediately means instantly or without delay.

name: relatively
trans: Relatively means comparatively or to a certain extent.

name: slowly
trans: Slowly means at a low speed or pace.

name: fairly
trans: Fairly means in a just or impartial manner.

name: primarily
trans: Primarily means mainly or principally.

name: completely
trans: Completely means entirely or fully.

name: ultimately
trans: Ultimately means finally or in the end.

name: widely
trans: Widely means extensively or broadly.

name: recently
trans: Recently means in the recent past or lately.

name: seriously
trans: Seriously means in a serious manner or with sincerity.

name: frequently
trans: Frequently means often or repeatedly.

name: fully
trans: Fully means completely or entirely.

name: mostly
trans: Mostly means mainly or for the most part.

name: naturally
trans: Naturally means in a natural way or without any artificial influence.

name: nearly
trans: Nearly means almost or close to.

name: occasionally
trans: Occasionally means sometimes or from time to time.

name: carefully
trans: Carefully means with care or caution.

name: clearly
trans: Clearly means in a clear or obvious way.

name: essentially
trans: Essentially means basically or fundamentally.

name: possibly
trans: Possibly means maybe or perhaps.

name: slightly
trans: Slightly means to a small degree or in a minor way.

name: somewhat
trans: Somewhat means to some extent or in a moderate way.

name: equally
trans: Equally means to an equal degree or in a balanced way.

name: greatly
trans: Greatly means to a large extent or significantly.

name: necessarily
trans: Necessarily means inevitably or as a logical consequence.

name: personally
trans: Personally means in a personal or individual manner.

name: rarely
trans: Rarely means seldom or infrequently.

name: regularly
trans: Regularly means habitually or on a consistent basis.

name: similarly
trans: Similarly means in a similar way or manner.

name: basically
trans: Basically means fundamentally or essentially.

name: closely
trans: Closely means intimately or with close attention.

name: effectively
trans: Effectively means in an effective or successful way.

name: initially
trans: Initially means at first or initially.

name: literally
trans: Literally means actually or in a literal sense.

name: mainly
trans: Mainly means primarily or chiefly.

name: merely
trans: Merely means only or just.

name: gently
trans: Gently means in a gentle or mild way.

name: hopefully
trans: Hopefully means with hope or optimism.

name: originally
trans: Originally means initially or from the beginning.

name: roughly
trans: Roughly means approximately or roughly.

name: significantly
trans: Significantly means in a significant or important way.

name: totally
trans: Totally means completely or entirely.

name: twice
trans: Twice means two times or twice as much.

name: elsewhere
trans: Elsewhere means in another place or elsewhere.

name: everywhere
trans: Everywhere means in all places or everywhere.

name: obviously
trans: Obviously means clearly or obviously.

name: perfectly
trans: Perfectly means in a perfect or flawless way.

name: physically
trans: Physically means in a physical or bodily way.

name: successfully
trans: Successfully means in a successful or effective way.

name: suddenly
trans: Suddenly means suddenly or abruptly.

name: truly
trans: Truly means truly or sincerely.

name: virtually
trans: Virtually means almost or nearly.

name: altogether
trans: Altogether means completely or entirely.

name: anyway
trans: Anyway means regardless or in any case.

name: automatically
trans: Automatically means in a way that is done without conscious thought or effort.

name: deeply
trans: Deeply means to an intense or extreme degree.

name: definitely
trans: Definitely means without doubt, for sure.

name: deliberately
trans: Deliberately means done consciously and intentionally.

name: hardly
trans: Hardly means barely or almost not at all.

name: readily
trans: Readily means easily and without hesitation.

name: terribly
trans: Terribly means in a very bad or serious way.

name: unfortunately
trans: Unfortunately means regrettably or sadly.

name: forth
trans: Forth means forward in time or place.

name: briefly
trans: Briefly means for a short period of time.

name: moreover
trans: Moreover means in addition to what has been said.

name: strongly
trans: Strongly means with great force or intensity.

name: honestly
trans: Honestly means in an honest or truthful manner.

name: previously
trans: Previously means at an earlier time or before.

name: as
trans: As means to the same degree or in the same way.

name: there
trans: There means in or at that place or position.

name: when
trans: When means at what time or during what period.

name: how
trans: How means in what way or by what means.

name: so
trans: So means in such a way or to such an extent.

name: up
trans: Up means towards a higher place or position.

name: out
trans: Out means away from the inside or center.

name: no
trans: No means not at all or not by any means.

name: only
trans: Only means and no one or nothing more besides.

name: well
trans: Well means in a good or satisfactory way.

name: then
trans: Then means at that time or subsequently.

name: first
trans: First means before anything else in order or time.

name: where
trans: Where means in or at what place or location.

name: why
trans: Why means for what reason or purpose.

name: now
trans: Now means at the present time or moment.

name: around
trans: Around means in a circular direction or surrounding.

name: once
trans: Once means on one occasion or at one time.

name: down
trans: Down means towards or in a lower place or position.

name: off
trans: Off means away from a place or position.

name: here
trans: Here means in or at this place or location.

name: tonight
trans: Tonight means on the present or coming evening.

name: away
trans: Away means at a distance from a particular place or person.

name: today
trans: Today means on the present or current day.

name: far
trans: Far means at, to, or by a great distance.

name: quite
trans: Quite means to a considerable extent or degree.

name: later
trans: Later means at a time in the future or subsequently.

name: above
trans: Above means at a higher level or position.

name: yet
trans: Yet means up until the present or a specified time.

name: maybe
trans: Maybe means perhaps or possibly.

name: otherwise
trans: Otherwise means in a different way or under different circumstances.

name: near
trans: Near means close to or not far away from.

name: forward
trans: Forward means towards a destination or goal.

name: somewhere
trans: Somewhere means in or to a place not specified or known.

name: anywhere
trans: Anywhere means in, at, or to any place.

name: please
trans: Please means as a polite expression of request or agreement.

name: forever
trans: Forever means for all future time; for always.

name: somehow
trans: In a way that is not known or specified.

name: absolutely
trans: Completely or totally.

name: abroad
trans: In or to a foreign country or countries.

name: yeah
trans: Yes or sure.

name: nowhere
trans: Not in or to any place.

name: tomorrow
trans: On or for the day after today.

name: yesterday
trans: On or for the day before today.

name: the
trans: Used to indicate a particular thing already mentioned or known.

name: to
trans: Expressing motion in the direction of (a particular location).

name: in
trans: Expressing the location of someone or something inside a place or thing.

name: on
trans: Expressing the location of something at the surface of a thing.

name: by
trans: Indicating the means of achieving something.

name: more
trans: To a greater extent or degree.

name: about
trans: On the subject of; concerning.

name: such
trans: Of the type previously mentioned or easily identified.

name: through
trans: Moving in one side and out of the other side of (an opening, channel, or location).

name: new
trans: Recently made, discovered, or created.

name: just
trans: Exactly or very recently.

name: any
trans: Used to refer to one or some of a thing or number of things, no matter how much or how many.

name: each
trans: Used to refer to every one of two or more people or things.

name: much
trans: To a great extent or degree.

name: before
trans: During the period of time preceding (a particular event or time).

name: between
trans: At, into, or across the space separating (two objects or regions).

name: free
trans: Without cost or payment.

name: right
trans: To an exact or precise extent or degree.

name: best
trans: Most excellently or effectively.

name: since
trans: From a particular time or event in the past until now or a particular time in the past.

name: both
trans: Used to refer to two people or things, regarded and identified together.

name: sure
trans: Completely confident or certain about something.

name: without
trans: Not having or using.

name: back
trans: In or into a previous position or state.

name: better
trans: To a greater extent or degree.

name: enough
trans: As much or as many as required.

name: lot
trans: A large number or amount.

name: small
trans: In a way that is limited in size or amount.

name: though
trans: Despite the fact that; although.

name: less
trans: To a smaller extent or degree.

name: little
trans: To only a small extent or degree.

name: under
trans: Extending or directly below something else.

name: next
trans: Coming immediately after the present one in sequence or order.

name: hard
trans: With a great deal of effort or force.

name: real
trans: Actually existing or happening as described or perceived.

name: left
trans: On or to the side of something that is considered the weaker or less important side.

name: least
trans: To the smallest extent or degree.

name: short
trans: In a way that does not take a long time.

name: last
trans: On or until the final part of an event or period of time.

name: within
trans: Inside something; inside a particular area or space.

name: along
trans: Moving in a constant direction on (a path or route).

name: lower
trans: At a lower level or rank than something.
In accordance with fact or reality.

name: bad
trans: Badly is used to describe how something is done, or how someone is feeling, in a negative or unpleasant way.

name: across
trans: Across means from one side of something to the other side.

name: clear
trans: Clearly means something is easy to see, hear, or understand.

name: easy
trans: Easily means without difficulty or effort.

name: full
trans: Fully means completely or to the greatest extent possible.

name: close
trans: Closely means in a way that is near in space, time, or relationship.

name: late
trans: Lately means not on time, or after the expected or usual time.

name: proper
trans: Properly means in the right or appropriate way.

name: fast
trans: Fast means quickly or at a high speed.

name: wide
trans: Widely means over a large area or range.

name: item
trans: An item refers to a particular thing or object.

name: wrong
trans: Wrongly means in a way that is not correct or accurate.

name: ago
trans: Ago means in the past or before the present time.

name: behind
trans: Behind means at the back of or in the rear of something.

name: quick
trans: Quickly means in a short amount of time or without delay.

name: straight
trans: Straight means without bending or curving, or in a direct and honest way.

name: direct
trans: Directly means in a straight line or without intervening factors.

name: extra
trans: Extra means in addition to what is usual or expected.

name: morning
trans: In the morning means during the early part of the day, from sunrise until noon.

name: pretty
trans: Pretty means attractive or pleasing to look at.

name: overall
trans: Overall means taking everything into account or in general.

name: alone
trans: Alone means without anyone else or being solitary.

name: bright
trans: Brightly means giving out a lot of light or shining strongly.

name: flat
trans: Flatly means without any emotion or enthusiasm.

name: whatever
trans: Whatever means anything or everything that.

name: slow
trans: Slowly means at a low speed or taking a long time.

name: clean
trans: Cleanly means in a way that is free from dirt, marks, or unwanted substances.

name: fresh
trans: Freshly means recently or newly.

name: whenever
trans: Whenever means at any time or every time that.

name: cheap
trans: Cheaply means at a low cost or price.

name: thin
trans: Thinly means in a way that is not thick or with very little substance.

name: cool
trans: Coolly means in a calm and composed way or without showing much emotion.

name: fair
trans: Fairly means in a way that is just, reasonable, or without bias.

name: fine
trans: Finely means in a way that is delicate, subtle, or precise.

name: smooth
trans: Smoothly means in a way that is without any roughness, bumps, or irregularities.
Falsely means in a way that is not true or accurate.

name: thick
trans: Thickly means in a way that is not thin or with a lot of substance.

name: collect
trans: Collectively means as a group or as a whole.

name: nearby
trans: Nearby means in the vicinity or close to a particular place.

name: wild
trans: Wildly means in a way that is uncontrolled or with great enthusiasm.

name: apart
trans: Apart means separated by a distance or interval.

name: none
trans: None means not any or not one.

name: strange
trans: Strangely means in a way that is unusual, surprising, or difficult to understand.

name: tourist
trans: Touristically means in a way that is related to tourism or the tourist industry.

name: aside
trans: Aside means to one side or out of the way.

name: loud
trans: Loudly means with a high volume or in a way that can be easily heard.

name: super
trans: Super means to an extremely high degree or level.

name: tight
trans: Tightly means in a way that is firmly or closely fixed in place.

name: gross
trans: Grossly means in a way that is extremely unpleasant or offensive.

name: ill
trans: Ill means in a way that is not healthy or suffering from a disease or illness.

name: downtown
trans: Downtown means in or towards the central part of a city or town.

name: honest
trans: Honestly means in a way that is truthful or sincere.

name: ok
trans: Okay means in a way that is acceptable or satisfactory.

name: pray
trans: Pray means in a way that is related to religious worship or asking for help from a higher power.

name: weekly
trans: Weekly means happening or done once a week.
